resources.string:
Please use a throwaway GMail account for the 'from' credentials! This app will not work correctly if the 'from' account uses 2-step verification and 'Less secure apps' must be enabled in the Google account settings.

The 'To' address can be any valid email address.

When all details have been entered you can invisibly trigger the email to send by starting the activity 'com.beatonma.who.Invisible' from an app like Tasker.

Choose 'Help' from the overflow menu to see this dialog again.

For more help or anything else, please contact me via my Google+ Community.
